title: Bearing gifts to Greeks? Happy birthday to Gerry Leonidas!
content:
Where would Typophile be without our favourite Greek specialist? Moreover, who else would take the time to come here and answer the many questions that prospective Rdg students propose? Today is Gerry Leonidas’s birthday, everyone… let the pun pronouncements proceed!

comments.content:
Welcome to Reading,  
Home of Gerry’s Kids :-)

ChrisL

Gerry and Klimis walk into a bar in Warsaw. The bartender speaks to Gerry in Polish. Gerry promptly orders drinks and dinner in perfectly spoken Polish. Klimis, looking awed and impressed at Gerry, says, “How do you understand Polish so well?” Gerry replies, “It’s all Greek to me!” :-P

ChrisL

Dan Reynolds and Paul Hunt walk into a bar in Reading and order three stiff shots each of uzo and down them quickly. The bartender immediately hands them each a pad of paper and soft pencils and remarks, “Ah, I see you both are taking Gerry’s class in Greek script for westerners.”

ChrisL
